summary: At the request of Balimund (Riften blacksmith) go investigate the ruins at Okains Summit.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Okains Summit[/color]
Okains Summit adds a new Dwemer city in the mountains bordering Morrowind. At the urging of a Dwemer logic engine (computer), the player takes the initiative to organize excavation and rebuilding of the city. To stay lore/mod friendly, the quests attempt to use base games quests as lead-ins while minimize any permanent impact to the wider Skyrim. You\'ll have a chance to hire crafters and shop keeps (assistants only) from other cities to work in Okains.

Feedback, suggestions appreciated. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27541/)

[color=red] - - - - - - - - ACTIVE QUESTS - - - - - - - - 

-------------------------------- FINDING OKAINS --------------------------------[/color]
Talk to Balimund (blacksmith) in Riften
Follow target up to Okains Summit (go East towards Morrowind, right up the mountain trail, and follow the blood)
Find key and get in Okains
Read Bob\'s Journal
Get in Control Center - turn on city power
Turn off security system
Get additional quests from the new quest hub


[color=red]-------------------------------- DWARVEN REMNANT --------------------------------[/color]
Collect followers to help you excavate the Undercity
	Any possible follower will have an option to help excavate
	51 different people may be asked for help; quest allows 5 at a time
The excavation happens faster the more people are helping
	First room takes 3 man-days (3 people for 1 day; or 1 person for 3 days)
	Full excavation takes 60 man-days (12 in game days if you have 5 people helping)


-------------------------------- DWARVEN REMNANT II --------------------------------[/color]
Recruit an inn keeper (Talen-Jei)
Recruit a blacksmith (Asbjorn)
Recruit any general shopkeep (almost anyone at the moment) (Drifa or Bersi)
Recruit an apothecary (Ingun Black-Briar)
Recruit a fisher (Valindor)
Recruit a stable hand (Shadr)
Recruit a mage (Sergius Turrianus)
Recruit any bard
Recruit a housecarl (not yet available - ralof or hadvar after civil war side chosen)

[color=red] - - - - - - - - BELOW QUESTS ARE W.I.P. AND NOT YET ACTIVE - - - - - - - - 

[color=red]-------------------------------- RIFTEN RABBLE --------------------------------[/color]
\'Convince\' the Jarl of Riften that Okains is not part of the Rift
Maybe end up paying taxes anyway


[color=red]-------------------------------- MOTHER OF THE ROSE --------------------------------[/color]
Available after Arniel\'s Endeavor (College of Winterhold) is done


[color=red]--- Other possible ideas, in order of likelihood ---[/color]
Add dwemer ghosts from previous games - http://www.uesp.net/wiki/File:TR_Creature_RadacStungnthumz.jpg
Hire traders
Dock out the back side of mountain to morrowind (you can\'t travel to Morrowind; it\'s would only be for trade)
Overlapping doors (with enable/disable) to select which extensions to build
	Underground ranch
	Honey farm
	Brewery addon in inn
	Bakery addon in inn
	Furniture store
	Select which Deadra/Divine to build a temple for (option enabled after completing relevant base game quest)
Seek a bard from Bard\'s college
Fight/help the thieves guild establish here
A rebuilt arena (like from Oblivion; maybe with spectator gambling; maybe with enable/disable obstacles; maybe with teams) - http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Oblivion:Arena_(faction)
Attempt to become Emperor after either Dark Brotherhood questline (and, for lore consistency, fail. Maybe replace the Riften Jarl with an Okains citizen though, like Mjoll)
The logic engine in Okains is easily expandable by other modders. Any mod can add a quest to the OkainsQuest formlist, and the logic engine will automatically give it to the player. (once the previous quests on the list are complete)

- - - Bugs - - -
FIXED - Reported some walls don\'t vanish (couldn\'t replicate, but added redundancy to script)
FIXED - Dirt pile grows too large after 60 days and blocks door
FIXED - Doors now pickable; only an issue if you need to cheat to get inside
FIXED - Blocked off doors to nowhere
author: jwbatey

files.name: okains_v010
files.changelogHtml:
Quest to find/open the Dwemer city of Okains Overcity is complete
Quest to recruit followers to excavate Undercity is complete
